name: Pixel Paint by Numbers
description:
Unique puzzle game where you paint the canvas according to the instructions horizontally and vertically. If you like Sudoku you will enjoy this new challenge! This puzzle is also known as paint by numbers, nonogram, hanjie, and griddlers.
Game features:
• Clever gameplay.
• Easy to use interface.
• 100 different levels.
• Start off with easy puzzles and continue with more difficult ones.
